verbs.description: Michael Avenatti [V: is] battling The Wall Street Journal after the publication reported Monday that he has been less than forthcoming with federal prosecutors investigating Trump 's longtime lawyer Michael Cohen about the $ 130,000 hush - money agreement signed with Stormy Daniels .
